content: GC 41 Gas can High-pressure gas can for use with the GX 3 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-pressure gas can – for better reliability in lower temperatures and high altitudes Maximizes the performance and reliability of your Hilti GX 3 nailers Applications Fastening with the GX 3 gas nailer ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): GX 3, GX 3-ME Substances contained: i-buthene, propene, propane Storage temperature - min.: 41 °F Technical Data | For use with (tools) | GX 3, GX 3-ME | Substances contained | i-buthene, propene, propane | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2105697 - Gas can GC 41 for GX 3 - Package Size 1 pc
